items.sentence: Tom told me that he was very hungry when he got home.
Tom took Mary to one of the best restaurants in town.
Tom and Mary were very happy to see each other again.
Tom and his wife both have to work to make ends meet.
Tom arrived in Australia three months after Mary did.
Tom asked Mary about what she did in school that day.
The only person Tom says he wants to talk to is Mary.
This book has been translated into several languages.
We don\'t have as much in common as I thought we did.
I\'ve got to do something I really don\'t want to do.
